sentence: Governor Brian Kemp (R-GA) just signed the Georgia Constitutional Carry Act into law, declaring, SB 319 makes sure that law-abiding Georgians including our daughters and your family, too can protect themselves without having to ask permission from state government.? Kemp elaborated, The Constitution of the United States gives us that right not the government.? As of this writing, the Peach State is the 25th state to adopt permitless carry.
author: Gabriella Hoffman
title: WH Gun Control Push Will Backfire on Democrats in Midterms
